title: PLAZA / KORTENAER
description: Previously known as Scab Leader. Wears a huge and intimidating set of armour. He is drunk and pissed off at his friend getting killed. He carries a big-ass gun.

dialogueTree.title: Kortenaer: ""Think you can hang our brother and..."
dialogueTree.text: "Think you can hang our brother and then just fucking *talk* your way out of it?" His eyes flash.

links.title: You: ""We're out of time. This is...""
links.text: "We're out of time. This is..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... the mercenary tribunal." The l..."
links.text: "... the mercenary tribunal." The lieutenant nods.

links.title: You: ""What do we do?""
links.text: "What do we do?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My plan is not to get killed." He..."
links.text: "My plan is not to get killed." He puts his hand on his holster. "But we have to intervene."

links.title: Authority: "He doesn't want to. But he must."
links.text: He doesn't want to. But he must.

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "The big one is the merc..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "The big one is the mercenary at the gates! The scab leader."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If this turns into a firefight, we..."
links.text: "If this turns into a firefight, we should take him out first." He nods.

links.title: Logic: "A sound strategy. He's the leader."
links.text: A sound strategy. He's the leader.

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "The big one is the damn..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "The big one is the damn *scab leader*."

links.title: You: ""Stop, this is the police!" (Get be..."
links.text: "Stop, this is the police!" (Get between them.)

links.title: Kortenaer: ""Get lost, comedian. You cops had y..."
links.text: "Get lost, comedian. You cops had your chance. Now it's fucking time for some justice." He licks his lips, waving his gun at the crowd. Losing his balance for a moment, he staggers backward.

links.title: Empathy: "I think he's calmed down a bit..."
links.text: I think he's calmed down a bit...

links.title: Half Light: "No, he didn't -- he's about to open..."
links.text: No, he didn't -- he's about to open fire.

links.title: You: "No, he's calming down. I can talk t..."
links.text: No, he's calming down. I can talk to him.

links.title: Half Light: "You can't think that way now, this..."
links.text: You can't think that way now, this is serious.

links.title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""...*PIGFUCK!*" The voice from bene..."
links.text: "...*PIGFUCK!*" The voice from beneath the helmet interrupts your thoughts. You only make out the last word.

links.title: You: "He is, he's about to snap!"
links.text: He is, he's about to snap!

links.title: Half Light: "Oh yes he is, he's about to snap an..."
links.text: Oh yes he is, he's about to snap and shoot someone right now.

links.title: You: "So which one is it, who's right?"
links.text: So which one is it, who's right?

links.title: Empathy: "He is. I was wrong."
links.text: He is. I was wrong.

links.title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""...*PIGFUCK!*" is the only word yo..."
links.text: "...*PIGFUCK!*" is the only word you can make out. It doesn't sound calm.

links.title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""...*PIGFUCK!*" is the only word yo..."
links.text: "...*PIGFUCK!*" is the only word you can make out.

links.title: You: ""I can see you're drunk.""
links.text: "I can see you're drunk."

links.title: Kortenaer: ""Oh yeah, welcome to the fucking pa..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, welcome to the fucking party." He looks around. "You're probably gonna get killed too, I don't give a shit if you're cops."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""No one is going to kill anyone. Le..."
links.text: "No one is going to kill anyone. Let's just put the guns down and talk like civilized human beings."

links.title: Rhetoric: "She doesn't seem to understand the..."
links.text: She doesn't seem to understand the severity of the situation.

links.title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "With a wordless gurgle, the killer..."
links.text: With a wordless gurgle, the killer loads his long rifle...

links.title: Kortenaer: "The leader gives a small nod to the..."
links.text: The leader gives a small nod to the helmeted man. Suddenly the blue medicinal spirit in your hand seems to have a pulsating glow. It feels enticing somehow...

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "All right! END GAME. Light me on fi..."
links.text: All right! END GAME. Light me on fire and throw me in his face!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Wait. It's a good thing you have an..."
links.text: Wait. It's a good thing you have an anthropomorphic petrol bomb. It really is. But you have to soften him up first. Present an argument!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "If you waste time people will die."
links.text: If you waste time people will die.

links.title: Suggestion: "No. We can do this. Drag it out a l..."
links.text: No. We can do this. Drag it out a little. Get under his skin.

links.title: Composure: "I don't know about this getting und..."
links.text: I don't know about this getting under his skin. What if he gets under *yours*? I'm barely keeping your hand from trembling here...

links.title: Empathy: "No, please. Peace -- it has worked..."
links.text: No, please. Peace -- it has worked this far. Start with the first idea you have, move down from that...

links.title: Half Light: "Whatever you do -- stop wasting you..."
links.text: Whatever you do -- stop wasting your time *thinking* about it.

links.title: You: ""Who is that?" (Point to the man) "..."
links.text: "Who is that?" (Point to the man) "I didn't know you had a third guy."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Warm blood pools underneath you. It..."
links.text: Warm blood pools underneath you. It's sticky -- and there's so much of it.

links.title: Endurance: "You're bleeding like a pig, but the..."
links.text: You're bleeding like a pig, but the bullet *seems* to have gone right through you. Don't go into shock and you might make it.

links.title: You: ""Listen! They didn't do it!""
links.text: "Listen! They didn't do it!"

links.title: You: ""You're all drunk, look at yourselv..."
links.text: "You're all drunk, look at yourselves!"

links.title: Volition: "DON'T GO INTO SHOCK. HOLD ON."
links.text: DON'T GO INTO SHOCK. HOLD ON.

links.title: You: "Listen... *through* the darkness an..."
links.text: Listen... *through* the darkness and the pain.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The Hardie boys are screaming, figh..."
links.text: The Hardie boys are screaming, fighting, dying. Someone jumps over you -- nearby gunfire shatters glass.

links.title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""STOP!!!""
links.text: "STOP!!!"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Eugene, to your right! Don't let h..."
links.text: "Eugene, to your right! Don't let him..."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""The cop! Protect the cop, he's dow..."
links.text: "The cop! Protect the cop, he's down..."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The Hardie boys are yelling. Someon..."
links.text: The Hardie boys are yelling. Someone is running, jumping over you. In the background you hear gunfire shatter glass -- and then a man in pain. A familiar sound.

links.title: Titus Hardie: "It's Titus. With a splat like meat,..."
links.text: It's Titus. With a splat like meat, you hear bullets rip into him. His voice, still giving orders, grows fainter... A gurgle...

links.title: Inland Empire: "He's not gonna make it."
links.text: He's not gonna make it.

links.title: You: "Touch your lower body..."
links.text: Touch your lower body...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Feels slick and warm with blood. Th..."
links.text: Feels slick and warm with blood. The pain is too strong to know what has happened there. Even clutching to your consciousness takes everything you got.

links.title: You: "What parts of me are... missing?"
links.text: What parts of me are... missing?

links.title: Endurance: "Liquid parts mostly, and you're qui..."
links.text: Liquid parts mostly, and you're quickly running out of them. There is a major artery on the inside of the thigh...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Most of what's down there."
links.text: Most of what's down there.

links.title: You: "Oh god..."
links.text: Oh god...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "... it's all gone. Open your eyes n..."
links.text: ... it's all gone. Open your eyes now. You have to see what's happening!

links.title: Inland Empire: "No. No. It's just a fear. Even if....."
links.text: No. No. It's just a fear. Even if... who cares. No one wants you anyway.

links.title: You: "I don't care. Fuck me."
links.text: I don't care. Fuck me.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You can also feel bone where the bu..."
links.text: You can also feel bone where the bullet went in. Something very sharp, like broken teeth under your fingers.

links.title: You: "(Try to open your eyes.) What do I..."
links.text: (Try to open your eyes.) What do I see?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Nothing. A persisting darkness. Dan..."
links.text: Nothing. A persisting darkness. Dancing lights of pain. Distant shadows cast by them, like a hellish play...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're bleeding out!" Nothing. Dar..."
links.text: "You're bleeding out!" Nothing. Darkness, blurring lights of pain. Out of it, a silhouette emerges -- crouching over you. A familiar voice, filled with urgency and fear.

links.title: You: ""No one wants to *do* anything with..."
links.text: "No one wants to *do* anything with me... no one wants to party with me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stay with me!" You feel burning ho..."
links.text: "Stay with me!" You feel burning hot tears streaming from your eyes.

links.title: You: ""This is a stupid world...""
links.text: "This is a stupid world..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes! Keep talking!" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "Yes! Keep talking!" The lieutenant pushes down on your wound, hard. "You hear me?! Stay awake!"

links.title: You: ""Everyone is so evil.""
links.text: "Everyone is so evil."

links.title: You: ""I don't want to be anymore. It hur..."
links.text: "I don't want to be anymore. It hurts."

links.title: You: ""Of course... I get gunned down and..."
links.text: "Of course... I get gunned down and die. Sorry fuck..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes! Keep talking!" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "Yes! Keep talking!" The lieutenant pushes down on your wound, hard. "Stay awake! Look at me!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "But you can't. It's so hard. Your e..."
links.text: But you can't. It's so hard. Your eyelids grow heavy and the sounds ever more distant. And a cold comes over you. The lieutenant, too, is somewhere far away. Almost gone... when suddenly! You sense something behind him...

links.title: De Paule: "A slender white shadow, towering. S..."
links.text: A slender white shadow, towering. Someone stands there -- raising her pistol at him. The lieutenant does not see it. He's pushing down on your wound with both hands...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Scream IMMEDIATELY! He's gonna die."
links.text: Scream IMMEDIATELY! He's gonna die.

links.title: You: "Just let the darkness take you."
links.text: Just let the darkness take you.

links.title: De Paule: "It's not all dark yet. As you're le..."
links.text: It's not all dark yet. As you're leaving, she is in there too with you. You can *feel* the slender figure move, like a snake. And then a distant gunshot. Velvety smooth. Muffled.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "A big pillow falls on you. Cold nyl..."
links.text: A big pillow falls on you. Cold nylon and blood. Slumped on you as the lights go out. All the lights. And the sounds. Of the world. Disappear.

links.title: You: "Fall into total darkness."
links.text: Fall into total darkness.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "This is death. One more door, baby...."
links.text: This is death. One more door, baby. One more door.

links.title: You: "Will I be a... ghost now?"
links.text: Will I be a... ghost now?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Brother, you already *were* a ghost..."
links.text: Brother, you already *were* a ghost. Up there, screaming -- along with all of them. Scaring each other. Haunting each other.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "It's the living who are ghosts. The..."
links.text: It's the living who are ghosts. The dead are silent. They don't rattle windows or write letters in blood. The living do. Leave them behind. Rest.

links.title: You: "Good, I want to die."
links.text: Good, I want to die.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Of course. I know you do. Everybody..."
links.text: Of course. I know you do. Everybody leaves, when they get the chance. Go on, keep falling. Deeper... take the door.

links.title: Kortenaer: "It's not all dark yet. As you're le..."
links.text: It's not all dark yet. As you're leaving, *he* is in there too, with you. You can *feel* the figure move. And then a distant gunshot. Velvety smooth. Muffled.

links.title: You: "No!!! Kim..."
links.text: No!!! Kim...

links.title: Authority: ""NO," you say, and hand out your fi..."
links.text: "NO," you say, and hand out your firearm to him. Your hand trembles and your eyes are full of fear.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "That's all it takes. There is no ro..."
links.text: That's all it takes. There is no room for hesitation. The lieutenant moves, like a spring unloaded. He grabs the gun from your bloody hand and fires behind him.

links.title: De Paule: "You hear a faint scream -- a woman'..."
links.text: You hear a faint scream -- a woman's. Then the sound disappears, like someone pressed STOP on the tape. The woman is gone. So is Kim. Then the whole world...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "That's all it takes. There is no ro..."
links.text: That's all it takes. There is no room for hesitation. The lieutenant moves, like a spring unloaded. He grabs the gun from your bloody hand and fires behind him.

links.title: Kortenaer: "You hear a roar of pain. A death sc..."
links.text: You hear a roar of pain. A death scream. The sound disappears, like someone pressed STOP on the tape. The hulking figure too is gone. And so is Kim. And the whole world.

links.title: Authority: ""No," you scream: "BEHIND YOU!" fro..."
links.text: "No," you scream: "BEHIND YOU!" from your bloody lips. Your eyes are full of fear.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There is no room for hesitation. Th..."
links.text: There is no room for hesitation. The lieutenant turns around and fires, his body falling on yours in the course of the motion...

links.title: De Paule: "You hear a faint scream -- a woman'..."
links.text: You hear a faint scream -- a woman's. Then the sound disappears, like someone pressed STOP on the tape. The woman is gone. So is Kim. Then the whole world...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There is no room for hesitation. Th..."
links.text: There is no room for hesitation. The lieutenant turns around and fires, his body falling on yours in the course of the motion...

links.title: Kortenaer: "You hear a roar of pain. A death sc..."
links.text: You hear a roar of pain. A death scream. The sound disappears, like someone pressed STOP on the tape. The hulking figure too is gone. And so is Kim. And the whole world.

links.title: Authority: ""Shoot... dead." You hear your bloo..."
links.text: "Shoot... dead." You hear your bloody lips mumble. You try to give him your gun, so he'd understand. But he does not. He does not look into your eyes and see the fear there.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He just shakes his head, still crou..."
links.text: He just shakes his head, still crouched over you. You hear a distant gunshot. Velvety smooth -- a red circle has appeared on the lieutenant's jacket. It's growing fast.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Like a pillow, he falls on you. Col..."
links.text: Like a pillow, he falls on you. Cold nylon and blood slumped on you, as the lights go out. All the lights. The last thing you hear is the sound of his spectacles landing on the pavement next to you.

links.title: Authority: ""There... behind..." You hear your..."
links.text: "There... behind..." You hear your bloody lips mumble, but he does not understand. He does not look into your eyes and see the fear there. He does not trust you.

links.title: Kortenaer: "A shadow, towering. Someone stands..."
links.text: A shadow, towering. Someone stands there -- raising his pistol at him. The lieutenant does not see it. He's pushing down on your wound with both hands...

links.title: You: ""Gunned down in the line of duty......"
links.text: "Gunned down in the line of duty... it's okay."

links.title: You: ""The wolf is at the door, Kim. He w..."
links.text: "The wolf is at the door, Kim. He will eat the sun."

links.title: You: ""Live fast... die *old*." (Wince fr..."
links.text: "Live fast... die *old*." (Wince from pain)

links.title: You: ""It's so dark... I can't see anythi..."
links.text: "It's so dark... I can't see anything."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stay with me!" The lieutenant push..."
links.text: "Stay with me!" The lieutenant pushes down on your wound, hard. "You hear me?! Stay awake! Look at me!"

links.title: You: ""Kim, I lied. About not remembering..."
links.text: "Kim, I lied. About not remembering who I am. I made it up... I remember everything."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stay with me!" You feel burning ho..."
links.text: "Stay with me!" You feel burning hot tears streaming from your eyes.

links.title: You: ""I'm a fucking failure and the love..."
links.text: "I'm a fucking failure and the love of my life left me."

links.title: You: ""Everyone knows I made it up. I'm j..."
links.text: "Everyone knows I made it up. I'm just a drunk. A stupid dead drunk."

links.title: You: ""There's a white shadow that smells..."
links.text: "There's a white shadow that smells like apricots, it's... always there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stay with me!" You feel burning ho..."
links.text: "Stay with me!" You feel burning hot tears streaming from your eyes.

links.title: You: ""I can't forget it. Even when I dra..."
links.text: "I can't forget it. Even when I drank so much..."

links.title: You: ""It said I have a vast soul. Do I h..."
links.text: "It said I have a vast soul. Do I have a... vast soul?"

links.title: You: ""I shouldn't have called her. Now s..."
links.text: "I shouldn't have called her. Now she hates me."

links.title: You: ""She would've started loving me aga..."
links.text: "She would've started loving me again... but I called her and now she won't."

links.title: You: ""Please call her, Kim.... She won't..."
links.text: "Please call her, Kim.... She won't listen to me."

links.title: You: ""The Wild Pines rep does not approv..."
links.text: "The Wild Pines rep does not approve of this!"

links.title: You: "Think of an argument!"
links.text: Think of an argument!

links.title: You: "Talk about hanged man."
links.text: Talk about hanged man.

links.title: You: "No. Let me back into the fight."
links.text: No. Let me back into the fight.

links.title: Limbic System: "Kim? There is no Kim. There is no f..."
links.text: Kim? There is no Kim. There is no fight, it's over -- it *was*...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Have mercy on yourself. Take the do..."
links.text: Have mercy on yourself. Take the door.

links.title: Limbic System: "The fight? There is no fight. The f..."
links.text: The fight? There is no fight. The fight is over -- it was lost. A thousand years ago. You have laid here forever. Keep falling. Deeper... take the door.

links.title: Limbic System: "He's *not* taking it. His body is n..."
links.text: He's *not* taking it. His body is not taking it. Oh god, no, he's not disintegrating -- he's swelling up instead. Over the hours. Hurting. Moaning in his sleep.

links.title: Limbic System: "And rotting. And being disinfected...."
links.text: And rotting. And being disinfected. And smelling of drugs and feeling saliva in his mouth. Drifting in painkillers. Thrashing in his wound sleep.

links.title: Volition: "He can't go. Not before the case is..."
links.text: He can't go. Not before the case is solved.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "There is a radio in the distance. A..."
links.text: There is a radio in the distance. A radio of the world. Playing sounds: Good morning, Elysium. Soon you will return to the world.

links.title: Endurance: "You're thirsty. Reach for the glass..."
links.text: You're thirsty. Reach for the glass of water by the bed. The world is still there. Sleep some more...

links.title: Limbic System: "Hours turn to days. Soon he will ge..."
links.text: Hours turn to days. Soon he will get up again and go through it -- again! Again! Finally, we know what the infernal engine was, outside -- the clarion call...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The engine of a Coupris Kineema..."
links.text: The engine of a Coupris Kineema...

links.title: Limbic System: "No. It was *him*. *He* is the infer..."
links.text: No. It was *him*. *He* is the infernal engine, can't you see? He never stops. He only gets worse.

links.title: Limbic System: "It was *him*. *He* is the infernal..."
links.text: It was *him*. *He* is the infernal engine. He never stops. He only gets worse.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Life gets haaaaaaaaaard. But we go..."
links.text: Life gets haaaaaaaaaard. But we go ooooooooooooooon...

links.title: Limbic System: "..."
You: ""Where is Klaasje? She can explain..."
links.text: "Where is Klaasje? She can explain this."

links.title: You: "Shoot Kortenaer."
links.text: Shoot Kortenaer.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "A plume of smoke and fire erupts fr..."
links.text: A plume of smoke and fire erupts from the gun and your hand goes numb from the explosion...

links.title: Conceptualization: "'I feel it in my fingers... I feel..."
links.text: 'I feel it in my fingers... I feel it in my toes...'

links.title: You: "Look through the smoke rising from..."
links.text: Look through the smoke rising from the barrel.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The smoke drifts west with the wind..."
links.text: The smoke drifts west with the wind. You hear the plaza erupt in violence, slow, like a waterfall in reverse.

links.title: You: "Look at Kortenaer."
links.text: Look at Kortenaer.

links.title: Kortenaer: "There is a hole in his cheek. Blood..."
links.text: There is a hole in his cheek. Blood gushes out as he stumbles backward, eyes filled with rage and disbelief -- gurgling, muttering something unintelligible...

links.title: Perception (Sight): "His lips -- moving, swollen with fe..."
links.text: His lips -- moving, swollen with fear -- are trying to say: 'Shoot him, shoot him!', but he can't.

links.title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "To your right, the killer raises hi..."
links.text: To your right, the killer raises his rifle and takes aim at you. His moves are steady, but the long barrel of the rifle sways slowly...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "A small explosion expels the bullet..."
links.text: A small explosion expels the bullet from the chamber. With a puff of smoke it hits the man square in the chest -- producing a soft clicking sound in the armour.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Like dice rolling."
links.text: Like dice rolling.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The kinetic energy of the 9mm front..."
links.text: The kinetic energy of the 9mm front-loaded bullet is distributed evenly across the chest piece and into his hands.

links.title: Kortenaer: ""Go ahead. Give it another try." Th..."
links.text: "Go ahead. Give it another try." The man doesn't even move. Hes smiling.

links.title: You: "Shoot him again."
links.text: Shoot him again.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This time feels different. You aim..."
links.text: This time feels different. You aim higher -- as if pulled by a magnet. Your hand goes numb from the explosion and a plume of smoke erupts from the gun...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Another soft explosion, like a fire..."
links.text: Another soft explosion, like a firecracker goes off in your hand. Another soft *click* from the gleaming white cuirass.

links.title: Kortenaer: ""They teach you to shoot the chest..."
links.text: "They teach you to shoot the chest in copland? Stupid fuck..." The man shrugs and turns to his left and says: "Kill him."

links.title: You: ""It didn't do *anything*?" (Look at..."
links.text: "It didn't do *anything*?" (Look at the gun.)

links.title: Kortenaer: ""Do it, primitive..." He points to..."
links.text: "Do it, primitive..." He points to his chest. "Take me out."

links.title: You: "Throw the gun at him: "Die!""
links.text: Throw the gun at him: "Die!"

links.title: Kortenaer: "The weapon bounces off his shoulder..."
links.text: The weapon bounces off his shoulder. He turns to his left and says: "Kill him."

links.title: You: "Do nothing."
links.text: Do nothing.

links.title: Kortenaer: "He turns to his left and says: "Kil..."
links.text: He turns to his left and says: "Kill him."

links.title: You: "Light the spirit bomb and launch it..."
links.text: Light the spirit bomb and launch it at him.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "With a crash of shattering glass an..."
links.text: With a crash of shattering glass and a terrible roar the fire draws in oxygen -- the bomb hits the mercenary in the chest,  swallowing him in flames as he staggers backward.

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "In the fiery inferno you see your t..."
links.text: In the fiery inferno you see your tie -- coiling around the man's neck. It is no longer horrific, but beautiful and *pure*.

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "'I only ever wanted you to have fun..."
links.text: 'I only ever wanted you to have fun, Harry!' it calls out to you. One last time.

links.title: You: "Wait!!! I didn't even know your nam..."
links.text: Wait!!! I didn't even know your name!

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "My name, should you know it, is Joo..."
links.text: My name, should you know it, is Joopson AS Men's Fashion, model "Colourful Tie." Catalogue no. J327.

links.title: You: "I know so little about you. How did..."
links.text: I know so little about you. How did we meet?

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "One day a sad man walked into a clo..."
links.text: One day a sad man walked into a clothing store. He looked really down. Like he hadn't had fun in years. He needed someone to show him how to rock and roll again.

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "Joopson AS catalogue no. J327 shone..."
links.text: Joopson AS catalogue no. J327 shone on the tie rack, trying to get his attention. The sad man picked it up and put it on. He looked at himself in the mirror. Didn't smile.

links.title: You: "This is gonna be fun."
links.text: This is gonna be fun.

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "And from that moment on -- we rode..."
links.text: And from that moment on -- we rode together. The rest of your clothes were still *normal* back then. But we took care of that soon enough.

links.title: Composure: "Normal police officer clothes just..."
links.text: Normal police officer clothes just don't go well with a multi-patterned disco tie made of 98.7% pure flammable polyester.

links.title: You: "I'm young again."
links.text: I'm young again.

links.title: You: "Nothing will ever heal me, but at l..."
links.text: Nothing will ever heal me, but at least I'll have a funny tie.

links.title: You: "Did we... have any fun?"
links.text: Did we... have any fun?

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "Truthfully? Not a lot. I did everyt..."
links.text: Truthfully? Not a lot. I did everything a multi-patterned necktie can do to help a man. I mean, I tried to get you to do *all* the fun things:

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "Drink beer, drink wine, drink cider..."
links.text: Drink beer, drink wine, drink cider, go to parties with young people around and drink beer *and* cider; do drugs too, so you don't fall asleep... You had *some* fun. But not enough to heal you.

links.title: You: "What's wrong with me?"
links.text: What's wrong with me?

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "Your heart is broken, *bratushka*...."
links.text: Your heart is broken, *bratushka*. And it cannot be mended. Believe me, I've tried.

links.title: You: "Am I going to stay like this foreve..."
links.text: Am I going to stay like this forever?

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "No. You're going to be mowed down b..."
links.text: No. You're going to be mowed down by gunfire from the two remaining mercs, so no. Not forever.

links.title: You: "Who broke my heart?"
links.text: Who broke my heart?

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "You both did, *bratan* -- deep down..."
links.text: You both did, *bratan* -- deep down you know it was the both of you.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "No, no. It was her mostly. Don't li..."
links.text: No, no. It was her mostly. Don't lie to him, necktie.

links.title: You: "What's going on with *that* guy?"
links.text: What's going on with *that* guy?

links.title: Kortenaer: "This guy? Well -- his face has *cra..."
links.text: This guy? Well -- his face has *cracked open* into a scream of terror. It looks like he's performing some sort of a shamanistic dance... that requires you to be on fire?!

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "Yeah, his body contorts in a very d..."
links.text: Yeah, his body contorts in a very disturbing manner -- there's no mincing words with this one. He's dying a horrible painful death as you're talking to your tie in your head.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Smells like a steak on the grill. T..."
links.text: Smells like a steak on the grill. The burning flesh in your nostrils....

links.title: You: "May he find peace in death."
links.text: May he find peace in death.

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "It's good to see you still have cap..."
links.text: It's good to see you still have capacity for compassion my friend. Deep down you are a good man.

links.title: You: "He got what was coming for him."
links.text: He got what was coming for him.

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "Eventually we all do, Harry."
links.text: Eventually we all do, Harry.

links.title: You: "Good bye, necktie!"
links.text: Good bye, necktie!

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "See you on the other side... The ne..."
links.text: See you on the other side... The necktie disintegrates into molten heat, its last remaining embers letting out a pop and crack that sounds like:

links.title: Beautiful Necktie: "Harry, for god's sake... WATCH OUT!"
links.text: Harry, for god's sake... WATCH OUT!

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You throw the bomb and it's way off..."
links.text: You throw the bomb and it's way off.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "IT'S A *FIASCO*, BRATAN!"
links.text: IT'S A *FIASCO*, BRATAN!

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Even at this distance, you can stil..."
links.text: Even at this distance, you can still make out the ugly tie suspended in blue liquid. It looks extremely worried.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Wow you threw it far -- great throw..."
links.text: Wow you threw it far -- great throw. Too bad the goal was to throw it a very *short* distance and now everyone will die.

links.title: You: "Thanks, coach!"
links.text: Thanks, coach!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Don't thank *me*, you did this!"
links.text: Don't thank *me*, you did this!

links.title: You: "What's going to happen now?"
links.text: What's going to happen now?

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "*What's going to happen now?* Every..."
links.text: *What's going to happen now?* Everyone's going to die, what do you think is going to happen?

links.title: You: "Wait! Uh... what's the story betwee..."
links.text: Wait! Uh... what's the story between us?!

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: You: "Like how did I get you, or...?"
links.text: Like how did I get you, or...?

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "You were a sad drunk who bought an..."
links.text: You were a sad drunk who bought an ugly tie -- who gives a shit! Everyone is going to die because our plan failed. I have *no idea* how you're gonna get out of this. No idea.

links.title: You: "So... it's not going to hit?"
links.text: So... it's not going to hit?

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "No. It's off. *Way* off. I told you..."
links.text: No. It's off. *Way* off. I told you.

links.title: Kortenaer: "The man it was supposed to hit is l..."
links.text: The man it was supposed to hit is looking over his shoulder -- to see where it went. And he can't see it! It's THAT OFF.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "This is it. I'm gonna hit the groun..."
links.text: This is it. I'm gonna hit the ground and burn away now. Most of the people in this yard are gonna die -- if not all. Probably you too. It's a COMPLETE DISASTER.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Get ready for a world of pain, man."
links.text: Get ready for a world of pain, man.

links.title: Volition: "No. Not a disaster. Weave this into..."
links.text: No. Not a disaster. Weave this into the story of you. Walk out of its *ruins*. Save those who still can be saved -- *I'm* on your side.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "And the lieutenant too. And the men..."
links.text: And the lieutenant too. And the men behind your back, drawing their weapons... you can live. You can get out of this.

links.title: You: "I'm sorry. (Conclude.)"
links.text: I'm sorry. (Conclude.)

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "I bet you are... The fiery containe..."
links.text: I bet you are... The fiery container hurtles toward the earth with a last wink of light. It shatters to a thousand pieces.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Around you -- time starts moving ag..."
links.text: Around you -- time starts moving again, the sounds of violence and panic.

links.title: You: ""... Fuck me, I forgot the bullets...."
links.text: "... Fuck me, I forgot the bullets." (Just stand there.)

links.title: Kortenaer: ""What's that, loincloth? I can't he..."
links.text: "What's that, loincloth? I can't hear you. Sounds like you got your mouth full of dick. Ruud..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Shit, this is it. Tell him anything..."
links.text: Shit, this is it. Tell him anything, tell him you have more information!

links.title: You: ""Kill me and you'll never find out..."
links.text: "Kill me and you'll never find out who killed your colonel. I've been withholding information."

links.title: Kortenaer: ""Ruud..." The man looks to his left..."
links.text: "Ruud..." The man looks to his left. "Kill him."

links.title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "To your right, the killer raises hi..."
links.text: To your right, the killer raises his rifle and takes aim at you. His moves are steady, but the long barrel of the rifle sways slowly...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "An Ister AR-FA7, built for taking o..."
links.text: An Ister AR-FA7, built for taking out light armoured vehicles. It will devastate you.

links.title: You: "Kim! Where is Kim?!"
links.text: Kim! Where is Kim?!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "From the corner of your eye you see..."
links.text: From the corner of your eye you see the lieutenant raise his pistol -- and aim it at Ruud.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He's trying to find a straight line..."
links.text: He's trying to find a straight line of sight before the rifleman can take you out. In the background, the leader is still on fire...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "It's not easy. He has 0.4 seconds t..."
links.text: It's not easy. He has 0.4 seconds to do so. He won't make it. You're on your own.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "It's not easy. He has 0.6 seconds t..."
links.text: It's not easy. He has 0.6 seconds to do so. He won't make it. You're on your own.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He's trying to find a straight line..."
links.text: He's trying to find a straight line of sight before the rifleman can take you out. In the background, the leader staggers...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He's trying to find a straight line..."
links.text: He's trying to find a straight line of sight before the rifleman can take you out.

links.title: You: "Blink -- think!"
links.text: Blink -- think!

links.title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "You stare down the barrel of the gu..."
links.text: You stare down the barrel of the gun. You see Ruud's mask behind it -- his eye in the slit of the helmet. Like a camera lens focusing on you.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "0.4 seconds remain. There are six l..."
links.text: 0.4 seconds remain. There are six little black dots in the tip of the barrel, like a honeycomb. This is a *nock cannon*. It shoots six rounds in one pull of the trigger.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Absolute destruction."
links.text: Absolute destruction.

links.title: Endurance: "Is there anything -- *anything* --..."
links.text: Is there anything -- *anything* -- we could use to protect this frail body? That gun will tear us to pieces.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He's drunk. Drunk fighters over-cor..."
links.text: He's drunk. Drunk fighters over-correct. Move right -- he aims further right. Get him to overshoot!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "A full suit of armour can't be too..."
links.text: A full suit of armour can't be too agile. You can shift direction faster than he can.

links.title: Suggestion: "Just dodge the first shot -- and th..."
links.text: Just dodge the first shot -- and the second will be easier. Drunks are quick to anger -- and make mistakes.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Titus -- behind you -- must be aimi..."
links.text: Titus -- behind you -- must be aiming at him right now. Don't forget, there's additional reinforcements. Just survive this...

links.title: Half Light: "There's no way, you're just gonna d..."
links.text: There's no way, you're just gonna die. Just close your eyes when it happens...

links.title: Endurance: "God, you're so frail. Too frail to..."
links.text: God, you're so frail. Too frail to think further, time is running out...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "0.6 seconds remain. There are six l..."
links.text: 0.6 seconds remain. There are six little black dots in the tip of the thick barrel, like a honeycomb. This is a *nock cannon*. It shoots six rounds in one pull of the trigger.

links.title: You: "Dodge the shot."
links.text: Dodge the shot.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You leap left. A swarm of angry lea..."
links.text: You leap left. A swarm of angry lead passes mere millimetres from your side, tearing fabric off your coat. Feels like the lightest of tucks.

links.title: You: "Joy! I am alive!!!"
links.text: Joy! I am alive!!!

links.title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "The man tilts his head, trying to s..."
links.text: The man tilts his head, trying to see through the clearing smoke -- for the *next* shot.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "WATCH OUT! To your left, de Paule i..."
links.text: WATCH OUT! To your left, de Paule is about to take a shot too -- at Kim!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""God, please..." the lieutenant say..."
links.text: "God, please..." the lieutenant says quietly, without trembling. He aims, face pale...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He's aiming for the eye-slot in Ruu..."
links.text: He's aiming for the eye-slot in Ruud's helmet. An extremely difficult shot...

links.title: Empathy: "He has to. The rifleman will fire a..."
links.text: He has to. The rifleman will fire at you again.

links.title: De Paule: "Then -- two shots ring at once. One..."
links.text: Then -- two shots ring at once. One from the lieutenant's pistol and the other from De Paule's. It's aimed at the lieutenant, but it misses. You hear a scream behind you...

links.title: You: "Kim -- did he hit the rifleman?!"
links.text: Kim -- did he hit the rifleman?!

links.title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "Blood gushes from the helmet's eye-..."
links.text: Blood gushes from the helmet's eye-sockets as Ruud staggers back, disoriented. The sounds coming from his helmet are not human.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "An unbelievable shot from the lieut..."
links.text: An unbelievable shot from the lieutenant.

links.title: Conceptualization: "The helmet looks like the face of a..."
links.text: The helmet looks like the face of an ancient god of war, crying blood.

links.title: You: "Who screamed?"
links.text: Who screamed?

links.title: Glen: "Glen -- dying in a puddle of blood..."
links.text: Glen -- dying in a puddle of blood behind you. His mangled torso has two gunshot wounds, blood gushes out of them like red geysers.

links.title: Inland Empire: "OH GOD! WATCH OUT!"
links.text: OH GOD! WATCH OUT!

links.title: Kortenaer: "You see two crazed eyes stare at yo..."
links.text: You see two crazed eyes stare at you -- through all the smoke and the panic. With blood gushing from his face the man raises his pistol at you. Then he squeezes the trigger...

links.title: You: "Look him in the eye."
links.text: Look him in the eye.

links.title: Kortenaer: "The look of vengeance. Framed by me..."
links.text: The look of vengeance. Framed by melting skin. This is the last thing he will do on Earth -- but he *will* do it. He will end you.

links.title: Half Light: "Here it comes. Death."
links.text: Here it comes. Death.

links.title: Kortenaer: "The look of vengeance. Framed in bl..."
links.text: The look of vengeance. Framed in blood, lips shaking. This is the last thing he'll do on Earth -- but he *will* do it. He is your end.

links.title: Kortenaer: "A look of happiness. His eyes seem..."
links.text: A look of happiness. His eyes seem unnaturally bright, shining like stars. Something in the fear must distort him somehow. He is evil. And the end.

links.title: You: "Evade the shot."
links.text: Evade the shot.

links.title: You: "Let it happen."
links.text: Let it happen.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You can't. There is no time. Someth..."
links.text: You can't. There is no time. Something inside your pelvis explodes. Your entire lower body is on fire and your legs can't support you... you fall down like a rag doll.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The pain is too immense to scream...."
links.text: The pain is too immense to scream. It pushes the air out of your lungs. Everything goes dark, a distant blur as you recede into it...

links.title: Kortenaer: "You see two crazed eyes stare at yo..."
links.text: You see two crazed eyes stare at you -- through the burning meat and the flames. With his face boiling off the man raises his pistol at you. Then he squeezes the trigger...

links.title: Kortenaer: "You see two cold eyes looking at yo..."
links.text: You see two cold eyes looking at you -- through all the smoke and the panic. And a pistol, raised, aiming at your chest, point blank. Then the man squeezes the trigger...

links.title: You: "I cannot be killed. I have become *..."
links.text: I cannot be killed. I have become *immortal*.

links.title: You: "(Shout.) "Stop shooting at me!""
links.text: (Shout.) "Stop shooting at me!"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "A low shot rings. You feel a tappin..."
links.text: A low shot rings. You feel a tapping, like rain on your chest plate. Heavy drops of rain. Then the sound of dice rolling, as the cuirass distributes the shot evenly from plate to plate.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You got hit. The armour took most o..."
links.text: You got hit. The armour took most of it, but still your rib cage burns. Feels like blood is slowly seeping into your lungs...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The shot rings and you stumble. Som..."
links.text: The shot rings and you stumble. Something violently tugs at your shoulder, pushing you backwards with incredible force.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "A volcano of burning pain erupts fr..."
links.text: A volcano of burning pain erupts from your left shoulder.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The pain flows over your entire bod..."
links.text: The pain flows over your entire body like an awful shock. A grim knowing rises from within -- half of your body must be gone.

links.title: You: ""Go ahead then. Kill me then. I *wa..."
links.text: "Go ahead then. Kill me then. I *want* to die."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uh, what?" The lieutenant quickly..."
links.text: "Uh, what?" The lieutenant quickly glances at you.

links.title: Kortenaer: ""Let me help you then..." The man l..."
links.text: "Let me help you then..." The man looks to his left. "Kill him."

links.title: You: ""God dammit. I did my best. I just..."
links.text: "God dammit. I did my best. I just need more time to solve the murder."

links.title: You: ""Me and Kim are gonna fucking murde..."
links.text: "Me and Kim are gonna fucking murder you!"

links.title: You: ""Why did I not find my lost gun..."..."
links.text: "Why did I not find my lost gun..." (Just stand there.)

links.title: You: "Stand there quietly; hope nothing b..."
links.text: Stand there quietly; hope nothing bad happens.

links.title: Kortenaer: ""What's the matter, loincloth? Mout..."
links.text: "What's the matter, loincloth? Mouth full of dick?" He croaks. "Think I'm gonna fucking spare you?!"

links.title: Kortenaer: ""What's the matter, loincloth? Got..."
links.text: "What's the matter, loincloth? Got your mouth full of dick?" He croaks. "Think I'm gonna spare you?! My brother is dead..."

links.title: Composure: "I'm barely keeping you together her..."
links.text: I'm barely keeping you together here. If you talk to him, he will rattle *you*, not the other way around.

links.title: Composure: "Yes, yes! Just throw the bomb at hi..."
links.text: Yes, yes! Just throw the bomb at him. I'm barely keep you together here -- no time to talk. He will only rattle you.

links.title: Suggestion: "Even if it comes to a fight it's a..."
links.text: Even if it comes to a fight it's a good idea to get under his skin first.

links.title: Kortenaer: "The leader gives a small nod to the..."
links.text: The leader gives a small nod to the helmeted man. Suddenly the grip of your side-arm feels comforting and warm in your hand. Feels like it's saying: Do it!

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Shoot him in the mouth. Shoot him b..."
links.text: Shoot him in the mouth. Shoot him before he shoots you.

links.title: Rhetoric: "No, wait! It's good you have that g..."
links.text: No, wait! It's good you have that gun. It really is. Just soften him up first. Present an argument!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "If you waste time people will die."
links.text: If you waste time people will die.

links.title: Suggestion: "No. We can do this. Drag it out a b..."
links.text: No. We can do this. Drag it out a bit. Get under his skin.

links.title: Composure: "I don't know about this getting und..."
links.text: I don't know about this getting under his skin. What if he gets under *yours*? I'm barely keeping your hand from trembling here...

links.title: Empathy: "Peace. Always peace -- it has worke..."
links.text: Peace. Always peace -- it has worked thus far. Start with the first idea you have, then move down from that, please...

links.title: Half Light: "Whatever you do -- stop wasting you..."
links.text: Whatever you do -- stop wasting your time *thinking* about it.

links.title: Composure: "I'm barely keeping you together her..."
links.text: I'm barely keeping you together here... this is *it*. The big one. If you talk to him, he will rattle *you*, not the other way around.

links.title: Composure: "Yes, yes! Just shoot him. I'm barel..."
links.text: Yes, yes! Just shoot him. I'm barely keeping you together here -- no time to talk. He will only rattle you.

links.title: Suggestion: "Even if it comes to a fight it's *a..."
links.text: Even if it comes to a fight it's *always* a good idea to drag it out first. Get under his skin.

links.title: Kortenaer: "The leader gives a small nod to the..."
links.text: The leader gives a small nod to the helmeted man. Suddenly your fingers holding the grip of a gun, that has just taken a life, tingle... Go for it, it seems to say.

links.title: Kortenaer: "The leader gives a small nod to the..."
links.text: The leader gives a small nod to the helmeted man. You feel your fists contract, as you stand there, between these men -- all carrying real weapons.

links.title: Rhetoric: "No, no. It's okay. Soften him up an..."
links.text: No, no. It's okay. Soften him up and trust the others to attack if it comes to that. Make him talk! Present an argument!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "If you waste time, people will die...."
links.text: If you waste time, people will die. And they will still attack you later.

links.title: Suggestion: "No. We can do this. Drag it out a b..."
links.text: No. We can do this. Drag it out a bit. Get under his skin.

links.title: Composure: "I don't know about this getting und..."
links.text: I don't know about this getting under his skin... He'll only get under *yours*. I'm barely keeping you together here. This is *it*.

links.title: Empathy: "Peace. Always peace -- it has worke..."
links.text: Peace. Always peace -- it has worked thus far. Start with the first idea you have, move down from that, please...

links.title: Half Light: "Whatever you do -- stop wasting you..."
links.text: Whatever you do -- stop wasting your time *thinking* about it.

links.title: Composure: "I'm barely keeping you together her..."
links.text: I'm barely keeping you together here... this is *it*. If you talk to him, he will rattle *you*, not the other way around.

links.title: Composure: "I'm barely keeping you together her..."
links.text: I'm barely keeping you together here. The more you talk the harder it will get, I'm afraid...

links.title: Suggestion: "Even if it comes to a fight it's *a..."
links.text: Even if it comes to a fight it's *always* a good idea to drag it out. Get under his skin.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You really, really should have a gu..."
links.text: You really, really should have a gun in your hand by now -- or *something* dangerous. This feels *scary*.

links.title: You: ""One wrong move and I'm taking you..."
links.text: "One wrong move and I'm taking you out."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "To your left you hear the lieutenan..."
links.text: To your left you hear the lieutenant cock his gun.

links.title: Kortenaer: ""We're gonna tear right through you..."
links.text: "We're gonna tear right through you, I don't give a shit if you're cops."

links.title: You: ""Easy now... No one needs to die he..."
links.text: "Easy now... No one needs to die here today..."

links.title: De Paule: ""Oh, people are gonna die today. We..."
links.text: "Oh, people are gonna die today. We're not leaving it like this. These *tribals* hung him up for everyone to see..."

links.title: You: "Say nothing, cross your arms."
links.text: Say nothing, cross your arms.

links.title: Kortenaer: ""You..." Kortenaer turns his bloods..."
links.text: "You..." Kortenaer turns his bloodshot eyes to you.

links.title: Kortenaer: ""You're probably gonna get killed t..."
links.text: "You're probably gonna get killed too... I think I'm gonna kill you. I didn't think I had it in me to kill a cop..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "To your left, you hear the lieutena..."
links.text: To your left, you hear the lieutenant cock his gun.

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "Let's walk away for now..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "Let's walk away for now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No," the lieutenant says firmly. "..."
links.text: "No," the lieutenant says firmly. "We have to step in. This is not going to end well if we don't..."

dialogueTree.title: Kortenaer: ""I'm all out of shits to give, loin..."
dialogueTree.text: "I'm all out of shits to give, loincloth." There's a feverish gleam in his eyes. "Welcome to the fucking reckoning."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Put your damn gun down." Titus rem..."
links.text: "Put your damn gun down." Titus remains calm. "People are gonna get hurt. We need to talk this through, alright?"

links.title: Kortenaer: ""SHUT UP!!! You're not gonna talk y..."
links.text: "SHUT UP!!! You're not gonna talk yourself out of this, loincloth-shit fuck!"

links.title: Perception (Sight): "This is the mercenary at the gates!..."
links.text: This is the mercenary at the gates! His chest rises and falls under the ceramic breastplate. His fingers reach for the butt of his sidearm.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "There's something very wrong with h..."
links.text: There's something very wrong with him.

links.title: You: ""He's dangerous...""
links.text: "He's dangerous..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ssshhhhh...." The lieutenant raise..."
links.text: "Ssshhhhh...." The lieutenant raises his left hand.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Elizabeth: ""This is a misunderstanding. Nothin..."
links.text: "This is a misunderstanding. Nothing irreversible has happened yet. You can just return to your unit and forget all about this."

links.title: De Paule: ""The kipt is merciful. Willing to s..."
links.text: "The kipt is merciful. Willing to spare us if we just forget about our murdered and humiliated commander." Her tone is frighteningly emotionless. "I think we should just kill everyone, Korty."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""You're all drunk, come to your sen..."
links.text: "You're all drunk, come to your senses!" She sounds very sure of herself. "You won't gun down seven people in the middle of the street. This isn't a frontier town or a jungle outpost."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Easy, Lizzie..." His voice is almo..."
links.text: "Easy, Lizzie..." His voice is almost gentle. "Let me handle it. I know guys like this. I'm sure we can come to a peaceful agreement. Ain't that right, fellas?"

links.title: Authority: "He is facing overwhelmingly superio..."
links.text: He is facing overwhelmingly superior firepower -- and he knows it.

links.title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""Peaceful..." It sounds like the ar..."
links.text: "Peaceful..." It sounds like the armoured figure is weeping.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""... nest in your abdominal cavity,..."
links.text: "... nest in your abdominal cavity, like a little wild mouse..." The masked man's words are barely intelligible, but you can hear them.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuck, she was right... That must b..."
links.text: "Fuck, she was right... That must be the *third* mercenary..."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This third one -- he is the most da..."
links.text: This third one -- he is the most dangerous of them all. Heavily armed.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuck, there's a third one... How d..."
links.text: "Fuck, there's a third one... How did we miss something like this?" The lieutenant points to the helmeted figure.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuck, there are *three* of them......"
links.text: "Fuck, there are *three* of them... I was hoping there would be... less." The lieutenant points to the helmeted figure.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This third one -- he is the most da..."
links.text: This third one -- he is the most dangerous of them all. Heavily armed.

links.title: Empathy: "The lieutenant is genuinely worried..."
links.text: The lieutenant is genuinely worried for his life. You should consult him before getting in there.

links.title: You: ""Kim, what's going on here?""
links.text: "Kim, what's going on here?"

links.title: Perception (Sight): "This is the scab leader. His chest..."
links.text: This is the scab leader. His chest rises and falls under the ceramic breastplate. His fingers reach for the butt of his sidearm.
